ayahs.textUthmani: يَـٰيَحْيَىٰ خُذِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ بِقُوَّةٍ ۖ وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلْحُكْمَ صَبِيًّا
ayahs.wordByWord: يَـٰيَحْيَىٰ [O Yahya] خُذِ [Hold] ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ [the Scripture] بِقُوَّةٍۢ ۖ [with strength] وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ [And We gave him] ٱلْحُكْمَ [[the] wisdom] صَبِيًّۭا [(when he was) a child]
ayahs.transliteration: Ya yahya khuthialkitaba biquwwatin waataynahu alhukmasabiyya

ayahs.textUthmani: وَحَنَانًا مِّن لَّدُنَّا وَزَكَوٰةً ۖ وَكَانَ تَقِيًّا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَحَنَانًۭا [And affection] مِّن [from] لَّدُنَّا [Us] وَزَكَوٰةًۭ ۖ [and purity] وَكَانَ [and he was] تَقِيًّۭا [righteous]

ayahs.textUthmani: وَبَرًّۢا بِوَٰلِدَيْهِ وَلَمْ يَكُن جَبَّارًا عَصِيًّا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَبَرًّۢا [And dutiful] بِوَٰلِدَيْهِ [to his parents] وَلَمْ [and not] يَكُن [he was] جَبَّارًا [a tyrant] عَصِيًّۭا [disobedient]

ayahs.textUthmani: وَسَلَـٰمٌ عَلَيْهِ يَوْمَ وُلِدَ وَيَوْمَ يَمُوتُ وَيَوْمَ يُبْعَثُ حَيًّا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَسَلَـٰمٌ [And peace be] عَلَيْهِ [upon him] يَوْمَ [(the) day] وُلِدَ [he was born] وَيَوْمَ [and (the) day] يَمُوتُ [he dies] وَيَوْمَ [and (the) day] يُبْعَثُ [he will be raised] حَيًّۭا [alive]
ayahs.transliteration: Wasalamun AAalayhi yawma wulidawayawma yamootu wayawma yubAAathu hayya

ayahs.textUthmani: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مَرْيَمَ إِذِ ٱنتَبَذَتْ مِنْ أَهْلِهَا مَكَانًا شَرْقِيًّا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَٱذْكُرْ [And mention] فِى [in] ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ [the Book] مَرْيَمَ [Maryam] إِذِ [when] ٱنتَبَذَتْ [she withdrew] مِنْ [from] أَهْلِهَا [her family] مَكَانًۭا [(to) a place] شَرْقِيًّۭا [eastern]
ayahs.transliteration: Wathkur fee alkitabimaryama ithi intabathat min ahliha makanansharqiyya

ayahs.textUthmani: فَٱتَّخَذَتْ مِن دُونِهِمْ حِجَابًا فَأَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْهَا رُوحَنَا فَتَمَثَّلَ لَهَا بَشَرًا سَوِيًّا
ayahs.wordByWord: فَٱتَّخَذَتْ [Then she took] مِن [from them] دُونِهِمْ [from them] حِجَابًۭا [a screen] فَأَرْسَلْنَآ [Then We sent] إِلَيْهَا [to her] رُوحَنَا [Our Spirit] فَتَمَثَّلَ [then he assumed for her the likeness] لَهَا [then he assumed for her the likeness] بَشَرًۭا [(of) a man] سَوِيًّۭا [well-proportioned]
ayahs.transliteration: Fattakhathat min doonihim hijabanfaarsalna ilayha roohanafatamaththala laha basharan sawiyya

words.translation: then he assumed for her the likeness
then he assumed for her the likeness

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَتْ إِنِّىٓ أَعُوذُ بِٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ مِنكَ إِن كُنتَ تَقِيًّا
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَتْ [She said] إِنِّىٓ [Indeed, I] أَعُوذُ [[I] seek refuge] بِٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ [with the Most Gracious] مِنكَ [from you] إِن [if] كُنتَ [you are] تَقِيًّۭا [God fearing]
ayahs.transliteration: Qalat innee aAAoothu birrahmaniminka in kunta taqiyya

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ رَسُولُ رَبِّكِ لِأَهَبَ لَكِ غُلَـٰمًا زَكِيًّا
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] إِنَّمَآ [Only] أَنَا۠ [I am] رَسُولُ [a Messenger] رَبِّكِ [(from) your Lord] لِأَهَبَ [that I (may) bestow] لَكِ [on you] غُلَـٰمًۭا [a son] زَكِيًّۭا [pure]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala innama ana rasoolurabbiki li-ahaba laki ghulaman zakiyya

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَتْ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِى غُلَـٰمٌ وَلَمْ يَمْسَسْنِى بَشَرٌ وَلَمْ أَكُ بَغِيًّا
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَتْ [She said] أَنَّىٰ [How] يَكُونُ [can be] لِى [for me] غُلَـٰمٌۭ [a son] وَلَمْ [when not] يَمْسَسْنِى [has touched me] بَشَرٌۭ [a man] وَلَمْ [and not] أَكُ [I am] بَغِيًّۭا [unchaste]
ayahs.transliteration: Qalat anna yakoonu lee ghulamunwalam yamsasnee basharun walam aku baghiyya

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ هُوَ عَلَىَّ هَيِّنٌ ۖ وَلِنَجْعَلَهُۥٓ ءَايَةً لِّلنَّاسِ وَرَحْمَةً مِّنَّا ۚ وَكَانَ أَمْرًا مَّقْضِيًّا
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] كَذَٰلِكِ [Thus] قَالَ [said] رَبُّكِ [your Lord] هُوَ ['It] عَلَىَّ [(is) for Me] هَيِّنٌۭ ۖ [easy] وَلِنَجْعَلَهُۥٓ [and so that We will make him] ءَايَةًۭ [a sign] لِّلنَّاسِ [for the mankind] وَرَحْمَةًۭ [and a Mercy] مِّنَّا ۚ [from Us] وَكَانَ [And (it) is] أَمْرًۭا [a matter] مَّقْضِيًّۭا [decreed.']
ayahs.transliteration: Qala kathaliki qalarabbuki huwa AAalayya hayyinun walinajAAalahu ayatan linnasiwarahmatan minna wakana amran maqdiyya

words.translation: and so that We will make him

ayahs.wordByWord: ۞ فَحَمَلَتْهُ [So she conceived him] فَٱنتَبَذَتْ [and she withdrew] بِهِۦ [with him] مَكَانًۭا [(to) a place] قَصِيًّۭا [remote]

ayahs.textUthmani: فَأَجَآءَهَا ٱلْمَخَاضُ إِلَىٰ جِذْعِ ٱلنَّخْلَةِ قَالَتْ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى مِتُّ قَبْلَ هَـٰذَا وَكُنتُ نَسْيًا مَّنسِيًّا
ayahs.wordByWord: فَأَجَآءَهَا [Then drove her] ٱلْمَخَاضُ [the pains of childbirth] إِلَىٰ [to] جِذْعِ [(the) trunk] ٱلنَّخْلَةِ [(of) the date-palm] قَالَتْ [She said] يَـٰلَيْتَنِى [O! I wish] مِتُّ [I (had) died] قَبْلَ [before] هَـٰذَا [this] وَكُنتُ [and I was] نَسْيًۭا [(in) oblivion] مَّنسِيًّۭا [forgotten]
ayahs.transliteration: Faajaaha almakhadu ilajithAAi annakhlati qalat ya laytaneemittu qabla hatha wakuntu nasyan mansiyya

ayahs.textUthmani: فَنَادَىٰهَا مِن تَحْتِهَآ أَلَّا تَحْزَنِى قَدْ جَعَلَ رَبُّكِ تَحْتَكِ سَرِيًّا
ayahs.wordByWord: فَنَادَىٰهَا [So cried to her] مِن [from] تَحْتِهَآ [beneath her] أَلَّا [That (do) not] تَحْزَنِى [grieve] قَدْ [verily] جَعَلَ [(has) placed] رَبُّكِ [your Lord] تَحْتَكِ [beneath you] سَرِيًّۭا [a stream]
ayahs.transliteration: Fanadaha min tahtihaalla tahzanee qad jaAAala rabbuki tahtakisariyya

ayahs.textUthmani: وَهُزِّىٓ إِلَيْكِ بِجِذْعِ ٱلنَّخْلَةِ تُسَـٰقِطْ عَلَيْكِ رُطَبًا جَنِيًّا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَهُزِّىٓ [And shake] إِلَيْكِ [towards you] بِجِذْعِ [(the) trunk] ٱلنَّخْلَةِ [(of) the date-palm] تُسَـٰقِطْ [it will drop] عَلَيْكِ [upon you] رُطَبًۭا [fresh dates] جَنِيًّۭا [ripe]
ayahs.transliteration: Wahuzzee ilayki bijithAAi annakhlatitusaqit AAalayki rutaban janiyya
